Package com.inrupt.client.authentication

Authentication support for the Inrupt client libraries

User control of data is at the center of the Solid ecosystem. As such, a robust authentication framework is a core part of all HTTP-based interactions. Furthermore, Solid is a decentralized system, where one cannot rely on a single way of handling authentication across all servers and applications.

The authentication module plays a critical role in the Inrupt client libraries, allowing developers to focus on their own application logic while allowing the low-level authentication interactions to work flexibly across different servers and different authorization frameworks.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HeaderParser
    A header parsing interface for the authentication module.
    SolidAuthenticationMechanism
    An authentication mechanism that knows how to authenticate network connections.
    SolidAuthenticationMechanism.Authenticator
    An interface for performing authentication over a network connection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessToken
    A class containing information about an OAuth 2.0 access token.
    BearerAuthenticationMechanism
    An authentication mechanism that makes use of bearer tokens.
    Challenge
    Part of the HTTP Challenge and Response authentication framework, this class represents a challenge object as represented in a WWW-Authenticate Response Header.
    DefaultHeaderParser
    A default header parser implementation.
    DefaultHeaderParser.ChallengeListener
    An Antlr listener for use with walking over the parsed syntax tree of a WWW-Authenticate header.
    DPoP
    An implementation of OAuth 2.0 Demonstrating Proof-of-Possession at the Application Layer (DPoP).
    SolidAuthenticator
    A class for holding registered authentication mechanisms.
    UmaAuthenticationMechanism
    An authentication mechanism that makes use of User Managed Access (UMA) authorization servers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthenticationException
    A runtime exception for use with authentication-related errors.
